column5: Just thought I'd post to remind you of the premier of Jamie's Big City Fishing show Looking forward to sitting down and watching it Congrats Jamie
I can't wait to see it but have a feeling that I'll forget and fall asleep
OK Dan I'll send you a PM
seriously that would be great, it will go off on my blackberry
Dan, wake up as you have less then 10 min. to get ready...
I'll have to PVR it this one...Packers and Bears on for the Monday nighter!
Ok I'm up, stop sending me PMs everyone lol  Love the show so far!
I was just about to PM you too, LOL!
GREAT show. He's very down to earth and very easy to follow.Talks in a language i can understand
That was a great show and I truly enjoyed watching It's my kind of fishing Way to go Jamie on your opening show..... loved it

Jamie's a  friend of mine and somebody I enjoy fishing with, infact he's one of the funniest guys I've ever had the pleasure of sharing my boat with. I enjoyed the 1st episode of his new show this morning and hopefully he does really well with it.  Best of luck my friend !!
I've been chatting with Jamie through e-mails the last few days.  I really liked the show, I hope it does well.  It's a different concept and a breath of fresh air.
it was alright. No idea why they'd show freakin HALIFAX for the premiere.
Lew I love the look a like    Sounds like Jamie's quite the comedian   I couldn't agree more with you Jim   May be they wanted to keep the best for last
I think maybe they are going geographically east to west across the country.
